doc.title: Annie & Mary: Reflections on the Railroad
doc.plot: Annie & Mary; Reflections on the Railroad explores the nostalgic sentiments surrounding the steam engine, and the way we romanticize icons and the past. Filmed in Humboldt and Sacramento counties, it includes 1940's footage of steam engines in the Redwoods, as well as interviews with museum operators, engineers, artists, historians, and model train enthusiasts.
